subdisciplines.name: Feminist Literary Theory
subdisciplines.description: The application of feminist theory to the analysis of literature, highlighting issues of gender, power, and representation.

subdisciplines.name: Marxist Literary Theory
subdisciplines.description: The application of Marxist theory to the analysis of literature, focusing on issues of class, power, and ideology.

subdisciplines.name: Postcolonial Literary Theory
subdisciplines.description: The application of postcolonial theory to the analysis of literature, examining issues of colonialism, imperialism, and identity.
